response.overview: In a remote Indian village, love, caste, and blind faith collide. After an elderly woman becomes the victim of a brutal crime, the community conceals its violence by transforming her into a deity. As silence and superstition take hold, a young woman quietly challenges tradition and questions the myths that bury the truth. Parvathy Puraanam is a poignant reflection on love, loss, resilience, and social justice - revealing how blind faith can mask brutality and how courage can awaken truth.
response.title: Parvathy Puraanam
